price: 6. Ciertamente han negado la verdad, y recibirán noticias de aquello de lo que se burlaban (el castigo de Al-lah, el cual se abatirá sobre ellos).
arabic: فَقَدۡ كَذَّبُواْ فَسَيَأۡتِيهِمۡ أَنۢبَٰٓؤُاْ مَا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: faqad kadhabū fasayatīhim anbāu mā kānū bihi yastahziūna
